moves.name: Absorb
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Growth
moves.description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Water Sport
moves.description: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Worry Seed
moves.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making its Ability Insomnia.
